'''Strong Strike''' is [[Aloy]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This passive takes effect even while Aloy is off-field.

==Trivia==
* [[w:c:horizon:Strong Strike|Strong Strike]] is also the name of one of Aloy's learnable skills in ''Horizon Zero Dawn''.
